txt.en: Every day there is something to do in Frostbluff.  Every day there is Yule!  Come and join everyone in Frostbluff and participate in many Yule Festival activities for five more days!
Every day there is something to do in Frostbluff. Every day there is Yule! Come and join everyone in Frostbluff and participate in many Yule Festival activities for three more days!
Every day there is something to do in Frostbluff. Every day there is Yule! Come and join everyone in Frostbluff and participate in many Yule Festival activities for three more days!
Every day there is something to do in Frostbluff. Every day there is Yule! Come and join everyone in Frostbluff and participate in many Yule Festival activities for three more days!

There is much to do during the Yule Festival! Participate often to earn wonderful gifts!\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>(There are twelve days worth of Festive Flurry and Spirit of Yule participation quests. Plan accordingly!)</rgb>

'Goodness me, where does the time go? The Yule Festival is almost over!\n\n'I must thank you, [placeholder]. You've done so much for this little town, and really made the festival special! I hope to see you next year, when I'll have a whole new set of gifts ready for you! Until then, Happy Yule!'
Mara Sandydowns is excited to welcome visitors to Frostbluff and encourages them to partake in all of the festival's activities.

'Welcome to Frostbluff, my friend!

'If you're here for the Yule Festival, I'd recommend you get in the spirit of the season and participate in many of our fun Yule activities. If you're not here for the Yule Festival, maybe you should be!

'Festive folks that participate in many of our activities and show their true holiday spirit might just earn themselves some wonderful gifts!'

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: this quest cannot be cancelled.</rgb>
Every day there is something to do in Frostbluff. Every day there is Yule! Come and join everyone in Frostbluff and participate in many Yule Festival activities to receive gifts!
